page.title: 13Traffic
page.content: From Boundary Lane in the D block it is possible to see the spur road to Bournemouth:the A31 road. The spur road is very busy all year round,but especially so in the summer when you can be stuck in traffic jams for anything up to an hour.The traffic jams are a result of people making their way to the beach,seaside hotels,holiday camps etc. However,Boundary Lane is quiet and peaceful for most of the year,with few vehicles using it.It does get busier in the summer months as on Boundary Lane there are several camp sites and a picnic area which are very popular.
